summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered on July 17, 2003. It includes information about the sender, recipient, and payment details, as well as a breakdown of charges and discounts applied.

persons.name: John Manning
persons.context: John Manning is listed as the sender of the shipment detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: B.E. Erger
persons.context: B.E. Erger is noted as the individual who signed for the shipment.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Pickup
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx on July 17, 2003.

events.title: Customs Entry Date
events.description: The customs entry for the shipment occurred on July 18, 2003.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-818-26177 and the invoice date is July 25, 2003.
Total charges for the shipment amount to $54.59 after discounts.
The shipment was picked up on July 17, 2003, and had a fuel surcharge of $1.59.
John Manning is identified as the sender of the shipment.
B.E. Erger signed for the shipment upon delivery.
